attributes.action: KEEP TONY BLAIR AS PRIME MINISTER FOR AS LONG AS POSSIBLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some people may dislike/hate him for the war and other policy decisions but...he has done this country no end of good in lots of other ways and at least you know where you are with him. He doesn't hide behind anyone, he faces criticism and takes the bad with the good. He's always up for a laugh, not like his stuffy predecessors and believes in what he's doing for the good of the country. No-one's perfect, and before everyone is quick to criticise because the policy doesn't suit you, imagine yourself in his shoes with the weight of the world (or country) on his shoulders. You'll miss him when he's gone...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
